answers.answer: some pain and pressure is normal but if you have any concerns always call your ob/gyn, midwife, or l&d. and your heart palpitations are normal in pregnancy.

question: I'm 29 weeks pregnant. I have gestational diabetes, I've been having a lot of pressure in my vaginal area, with a shooting pain to my anal area. I also have a lot of abdominal pain. And my heart beats really fast from time to time. Is this at all normal?
title: is it normal
